DOC.brief_summary: Entre Familia 4-year randomize controlled trial fund American Cancer Society . The study conduct Imperial County , California , involve partnership Institute Behavioral Community Health San Diego State University Cl√≠nicas de Salud del Pueblo , Inc. private , non-profit corporation provide comprehensive primary care service resident throughout Imperial Riverside Counties . The investigator enrol 361 Latina mother one child age 7 13 year old ; 25 % family , father also enrol . Participants randomly assign either intervention delayed-treatment control condition . The intervention consist community health worker ( promotora ) -delivered home-based intervention promote healthy eating . The promotoras use telenovela DVD series accompany manual , write produce study staff . The intervention deliver 11 home visit 4 support telephone call 4 month period . Participants delayed-treatment condition receive intervention material evaluation assessment complete . Evaluation measure take baseline , 4 month ( immediate post-intervention ) 10 month ( 6-months post intervention ) . Participants complete self-report interview study staff time point . Height weight measurement also collect mother child . The primary outcome change mother ' daily fruit vegetable intake . Secondary outcome mother , child father include change fat intake , sugary beverage intake , parent strategy , perceive barrier healthy eating .
DOC.criteria: Mothers : must selfidentify Latina , must able read speak Spanish , must least 18 year old , must resident Imperial County , must plan reside county 10 month study duration . Children ( gender ) : must age 713 year , must reside his/her mother spouse/partner least 4 day week . Families intend move away Imperial County end study , family family member medicallyprescribed diet
